analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule violates 42 U.S.C. § 2000e of Title VII and Supreme Court precedent (Griggs v. Duke Power Co., 1971) by failing to conduct and disclose a demographic impact analysis.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting legal concerns regarding civil rights and the need for compliance with existing laws, which indicates a defense of merit-based systems and employee rights.
